Manticore-and-Wyvern.name: Manticore-and-Wyvern
Manticore-and-Wyvern.flavor: You lure two enemies into each other’s blows, giving an ally a chance to take a shot.
Manticore-and-Wyvern.onHit: Slide the target 2 squares. Choose one creature now adjacent to the target. The target makes a melee basic attack against that creature, and that creature makes a melee basic attack against the target. An ally within 5 squares of you can make a basic attack against the target.

Casting Ripples.name: Casting Ripples
Casting Ripples.flavor: You extricate your allies from their predicaments, giving them the opportunity to reengage—or to flee.
Casting Ripples.effect: Push willing allies in the burst a number of squares up to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Straw Soldiers.name: Straw Soldiers
Straw Soldiers.flavor: You strike a true blow and drive your allies to keep their true locations from the enemy.
Straw Soldiers.effect: You and your allies gain concealment against all attacks until the end of you next turn.
Straw Soldiers.sustainMinor: When you sustain this power, the concealment effect persists.
